website_summaries.verdict: If you need an air rifle with more stopping power than the average model, this one is well worth your consideration.
pros: Topping out at 1,650 fps, this air rifle was made for especially powerful shots
cons: Somewhat difficult to cock this air rifle

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crazy powerful!!!! I dropped a 40lb hog at 25 yards. My buddy and I stood there in disbelief for a few seconds while the hog dropped dead in its tracks. Didn't even make peep. I highly recommend it !!!!!!! I hope Gammo makes a 25 cal so I can have both calibers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rifle.
customer_reviews.text: Rifle is hard to cock, but fantastic in every other aspect. It's worth the effort to cock. The pellets are actually breaking the sound barrier (>1100 fps). The scope works well too, but can be hard to get close enough to your eye with the 'anti-shock' mount that they use. For me that doesn't take away from 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Here wabbit wabbit wabbit.
customer_reviews.text: Whoa is this Gamo Magnum a beast! It's Almost as loud as a real .22 rifle and also powerful. I'm consistent @ 25 yd. Dime size groups and it loves the Gamo Redfire's. Save your money on looking for that right pellet because Gamo Redfire's are those pellets. Penetrates an inch into pine wood 2×4 from 25yds. Scope is ok but I would upgrade. Man I love this rifle. Can't wait till I get my first rabbit in October. we
customer_reviews.author: Vinny D.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was terrible
customer_reviews.text: Nice rifle for varmint control. It is very powerful and accurate! Seller shipped rifle in inferior packaging. Plastic wrapper was torn in several places and box was dented. Gamo Service refurbished gun and it is as good as new. Seller was unapologetic. Buyers beware of this seller.
customer_reviews.author: darrell pennycoff

customer_reviews.title: Best .22 rifle so far
customer_reviews.text: Penetrates 4mm of sheet metal easily. I grew up with a Sheridan Blue Streak air rifle. This rifle is more powerful. I Had plenty of kills with that rifle. You still need to know how to shoot. By far my favorite, I purchased three others and returned two. As you can see it takes down any garment as well as larger things. Very accurate and powerful. It has a five year warranty. It's made in Spain Not China like most things.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a target rifle, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I am greatly disappointed with this pellet gun. I have shot competition most of my life and while I did not expect it to shoot through the same hole I did expect a dime size pattern at 30 yards. I tried every brand of pellet I could find but so far the groups (from a bench rest inside an enclosed barn) have been 3-4 inches. I mounted a Nikon high quality 3x9 rifle scope on this rifle but had the same results. I would not recommend this rifle to anyone for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl13331

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful air gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a high end air rifle that is both accurate and light weight. The scope that comes with it is nice and clear and easy to adjust. My problem with it was it takes 50 fp of arm strength to cock it. You need to have arm strength to pull it down. Lots of it. The other thing is that it shoots a .177 pellet so fast it goes super sonic and breaks the sound barrier! Way too noisy for a neighborhood. It sound like a .22 rim fire from a distance. Great gun for power but needs to be away from town to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lorensd1

customer_reviews.title: With this rifle, anyone can target shoot like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw a write up on this,( Gamo,Magnum,1650), I wanted one, and after just a short time, I was able to get mine, because the price for this gun is well down into the entry level, even though it is able to shoot far above that. Using a bench rest to shoot from, I was soon having to tape over my existing pellet holes in order to see where my shots went, many were going into an existing hole! I am no expert, but with this Magnum 1650, I can and do, sometimes shoot like one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: THIS RIFLE IS GREAT BUT THE SCOPE IS MANURE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this air rifle for pest control based upon previous reviews. The rifle seems to have a lot of power. Trigger has a hard pull and must be adjusted. Stock is sturdy. MAJOR PROBLEM: THE SCOPE IS TOTAL JUNK (WOULD NOT ADJUST/SIGHT IN). THE MANUFACTURER, GAMO, SHOULD FIND A HIGHER QUALITY SCOPE TO INCLUDE IN THE PACKAGE OR LOWER THE PRICE AND LET THE CONSUMER BUY THEIR OWN.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Big, loud, powerful, and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Straight out of the box, without even cleaning the barrel, it was holding 5 shot groups I could cover with my thumbnail from ~23 yards with CPHPs. Reviews on YouTube put it around 27-28 fpe depending on the pellet. The only real downside is that it's a bear to cock. They say about 50lb of force to cock it, and it does feel like it. It's also pretty loud and has quite a lot of recoil, but that fits with its character. The scope so far is holding zero, but I wouldn't be surprised if it didn't live very long on this thing, as lively as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Family

customer_reviews.title: NOT light weight, but WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is POWERFUL, accurate and very much like a .22 rifle. The sound is the same as a .22 rifle certainly. It is heavy, and cocking the barrel to load it is rather difficult, so you'd best work out or be strong. This is the most powerful pellet rifle I've ever seen, and once you calibrate your scope with 2-3 test shots, you can hit targets 1,000' or more away. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: A joy to shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Gamo's best gun for the price. Accurate. Powerful! Beautiful scope. Love the fiber optic iron sights. Beautiful adjustable trigger. Lovely texture on the body of the rifle. Loud compared to other models, but it's okay. A bit too heavy, but absolutely my favorite gun, compared to other brands and models. Worth the money, for me.
customer_reviews.author: Interested customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this rifle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great rifle!!! I bought the .22cal and glad I did. Squirrels, crows, and any other critter don’t stand a chance. Accurate with both iron sights and scope. Took a bit to sight the scope in but it’s been great. Takes a little effort to cock but just do it quickly and put your whole body into it and it’s fine. Highly recommend this rifle.
customer_reviews.author: T. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: What a great pellet rifle Update: Bought this rifle last fall. Living in the suburbs I can't eliminate squirrels with my 20 gauge shotgun anymore. This rifle is dead on shooting rabbit magnums. Once hit squirrels are done. Also using a green laser, as it's just easier to lay the dot on them and pull the trigger. With the heavy lead pellets noise not really an issue, and the heavy load works best for knock-down. I have tried numerous pellets, and the rabbit magnums seem to be the best in this application.
customer_reviews.author: James L Margrave Jr

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Air Rifle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wicked nice air rifle. It's all the things that the five star ratings claim. For me, though, I wasn't prepared for the oomph it took to pump it. Lucky me, I ended up selling it right away to a friend who was excited that I had gotten one. "Want it?" "Sure!", he said. So, I guess if I were in better shape, it would've gotten five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Musician491

customer_reviews.title: .22 magnum is loud but i like it like that.
customer_reviews.text: don't need to look any further if your looking for a break barrel air rifle its got power i think more powerful then the hatsan break barrels the only thing is that this gamo magnum .22 is loud it has a crack like a 22 long rifle for ammo i noticed it fires well with the JSB monster straton its a heavy pellet but at 25 yards you'll be able to drop game maybe as big as fox or even bigger.
customer_reviews.author: KANAKA MAOLI

customer_reviews.title: Good rifle a little heavy. Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The rifle is powerful but the scope is garbage. Cross hairs spun with each shot. The iron sights are awesome. The rifle is a little heavy and long. I had a little trouble with the lockup on the break barrel, so I sent it back. I liked my Gamo Swarm Maxxim better honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco Javier Preciado

customer_reviews.title: To Operator very loud to observer not so much as a .22 but .177 real loud.
customer_reviews.text: This rifle I have used just with open sites and have not mounted scope yet. Only have 60 ft to target in my yard. This will put the pellet in the bulls eye all day long. Tough break Barrel. I am strong and cocking this rifle is a challenge to most that are not in great shape strength wise. LOVE THIS RIFLE very well made and very very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Chaloupka

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a toy, treat like a real firearm.
customer_reviews.text: Great pellet gun, however, the strength needed to cock the rifle is more than many kids could handle. But, this might be a good thing if a child did manage to get hold of it. It is quite powerful. Mine had no problem going through a 3/4" board and penetrating a 4" x 4" from about 18'. I would say it is more potent than a .22 short. Definitely not a toy, it should be handled like any other firearm!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gun but be sure to lock tight scope screws, just got it zeroed in and then started shooting to the right, then scope hit me between eyes, then had to drive home to put scope back on didn't take Allen wrench with me,would be nice for instructions on scope never had a scope that adjust on both ends
customer_reviews.author: gary gregory

customer_reviews.title: best air rifle and safe
customer_reviews.text: I needed a gun that is accurate and fun to target shoot and is impossible for my babies to use! This does the job, don't get fooled this rifle is as powerful as a 22 and to cock it will take some muscle so my 10 year old cannot do it. As he gets older he will for now I want to shoot it only in my presence. Accuracy is great, the pellets make a difference though so select wisely. Maintenance of the gun? - wipe it off, the pellets do the rest :) love that too!
customer_reviews.author: Sucks not enough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, 5 year warranty, accurate can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard working mule. Once you get the feel for it 100 yard shots within a half inch space all day. They barely even twitch when this goes through them . You can hear the meat pop. Love it shoot it every day. You have to get used to the break barrel if your not in shape . If your not it will make your arms stronger win win.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Powerful !!!
customer_reviews.text: My property is overrun with ground squirrels and with all the burrows I'm afraid the livestock will break a leg. This .22 cal air rifle is exactly what I needed to help get rid of the squirrels. It is definitely tough to cock, but once you get the proper leverage it is doable. I've only had it for about 2 weeks and only about 50 pellets, but once it got zeroed in, it is the perfect rifle for my needs. My only concern is the previous reviews about the scope and barrel droop, we'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It was previously owned it was broken the box was tore up it was just a bad rifle the scope was bad everything was bad and even hot the Box opener inside of it. It was not new when I got it
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Torres

customer_reviews.title: very fine product from Gamo
customer_reviews.text: very fine product from Gamo. it took very few shots and once zeroed. Wow. its been 5 months and 2500 shots later and still shoots and feels like a magnum.
customer_reviews.author: Wodi

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, loud, and heavy to cock. Haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, loud, and heavy to cock. Haven't found a pellet this air rifle likes yet. Not accurate... every group has unacceptable spread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard hitting!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something quiet for raccoons and other country night pests. This was a great purchase. It did take me some practice to comfortably break the barrel. It's not difficult but the muscles involved take a bit of time to figure out, it's not a bad thing. It reminded me of when I first used a compond bow. It's something different and practice is paramount. It's hard hitting and accurate, H&N Baracuda Hunter Extreme, great scope too! I've put a few hundred rounds through it and not one complaint thus far.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: Had a Beeman prior to this gun, it was solid but HUGE and heavy. This gun handles well but likes heavy grain pellets for accuracy more than lighter pellets. Boy, its accurate and holds it well!
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Air Rifle!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful with no kickback at all. Impressed with this air rifle. Larger scope works well. Break barrel loading, you need to rest this on a solid surface to break the barrel - build up those muscles! Extremely accurate once dialed in.
customer_reviews.author: DIYChik

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate !
customer_reviews.text: I have had zero luck getting this thing to hold a decent group. I've tried pellets from 4 different brands as well as different weights and can't hold a decent group at 25 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is so awesome that I can’t believe it doesn’t cost a lot more! It is super powerful and very accurate. It does take a bit of strength to cock it though. This thing is no toy, that’s for sure! Great value for the money for sure!!! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: 150 rounds to sight in, at 400rounds lost power ...
customer_reviews.text: 150 rounds to sight in,at 400rounds lost power,was grouping quarter size at 25 yrds & 50yrds, took scope off thinking problem was scope . not the case . could not hit 55 gallon drum @ 30 feet with open sights. impressed with first 150 rounds. gamo warranty has the gun at this point waiting to hear from them its been 2 weeks. i have only had for 3 weeks.hope i can add to this when i am able to put 1000 rounds with no problems & i get it back from warranty i will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Gamo pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: Long pellet rifle with a great scope it came with. This is one of gamo most powerful pellet rifle. With it being a powerful rifle the break barrel is also around 40 lbs to break barrel and cock it. After several times of breaking the barrel to shoot it. It will start to put a number on your arm. Other than that Gamo have met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE G.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome..... when the neighbors are away
customer_reviews.text: Love the power of this weapon, the feel and the accuracy. I bought it to take care of a serious squirrel problem and I am sure it would do the trick but I can't shoot the frigan thing in my neighborhood cause it sounds like a .22 going off. I have to stick with my varmint hunter 1000 fps rifle with less power but also less attention grabbing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brian ALBERT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun with lots of power
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gun with lots of power, sited gun in within 10 shots, hitting at 50 yards all in the size of a baseball... I was using predator pollymag ..the only negative is cocking this gun takes some effort!! But the reward is the power and accuracy, so it's worth it!! I highly recommend this gun!!
customer_reviews.author: jason stevens

customer_reviews.title: wow..
customer_reviews.text: put the scope on with wrench provide put a pellet in an 100 yards ..rite on the mark..wow super powerful..very nice quality ..even the scope is very nice how you can dial it in..I like it very nice..
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is I can't find the pellets that have a black plastic skirt with a metal BB in the end. Those rounds will go through any coin, at a very short distance, with a .177 so I'm curious to see if three mass of a .22 will do the same. I have the Gamo with the lead skirt and the BB but not the ones with plastic skirt. This rifle is very powerful and refined
customer_reviews.author: ZSRULE65

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Groups are around 2” at 25 yards with 15gr. sniper magnum pellets with a good Bushnell scope. To compare, my groups are within 1/4” with my .22 rife at the same distance. The scope that came with it is trash as it would jump high and right about 1/4” after every shot. Not worth the money, and GAMO claims that this grouping is “acceptable” at that distance.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly_bradams

customer_reviews.title: Scope issues
customer_reviews.text: The scope is garbage. No more down or left, left in it to get get sighted in. I'm 3/4" right and same high at 20 yards.. Started out a solid 10"'s high and about 8"'s right.. The gun itself is great, very powerful..
customer_reviews.author: matt p

customer_reviews.title: Work on your cocking technique
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, seems like a great gun. I managed nickel sized groups at 25 meters on day 1 with it using Crosman 14 gr hollow points. Plenty of penetrating power past 50 meters as s well. Definately takes a good deal of strength to cock, but big piston, big power, go figger....not a surprise. Overall, I love this rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: High Cocking Effort, High Noise Level
customer_reviews.text: This rifle has a 41 lb cocking effort which is too high to cock safely if are not strong enough. I had to use two hands with the butt retained by my foot on the ground. It also is very loud and not suitable if you have close neighbors. The rifle is a very strong shooter with high velocity and good accuracy with the scope. I cannot use the rifle due unsafe cocking effort level and the high noise level.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sedam

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to get the perfect pellet for the most in accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The most powerful air rifle I have used. Still trying to get the perfect pellet for the most in accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Bm1976

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel hammer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my buddy and he loves it. He has had numerous air guns and feels more confident with this one for taking small game. He has been harvesting squirrels with it ever since he got it sighted in.
customer_reviews.author: Zach L Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great set up
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and accurate. I've installed a Hammers 3x9x32mm AO scope with a one piece mount. Great set up .No issues with over 350 rounds. Great results with CPHP 14.3g. I'm getting 940 fps.Shipping was on time but poorly packaged. Was not doubled boxed. Minor scuff on front sight. No real problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pool

customer_reviews.title: I’m not a great shot with an air rifle
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a great shot with an air rifle. Working on the right grip. That being said, this rifle is very accurate. Put a good scope on it. Easy two inch groups at 100 yards. No complaints. Liked my .177. Love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnum .22cal air rifle
customer_reviews.text: A1 service. Item as shown and shipping on time. A1++++++
customer_reviews.author: Challoner

customer_reviews.title: Turn air into bullets
customer_reviews.text: Nice gun, easy to use, great kits comes almost ready out of the box all you have to do is screw on scope (2) screws and dial it in and you’re ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: While I love this rifle's power and accuracy, I definitely wish it did not take as much strength to break the barrel down. At times it requires lots of strength. I am 6'4' 250lb and i have to struggle.
customer_reviews.author: RipWms

customer_reviews.title: solid gun
customer_reviews.text: Solid hard hitting 22 groups nice out the box I'm impressed its a little heavy and not he easiest to cock but wow!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Bad as heck accurate so accurate and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Long shots short shots was shooting at 45 yards with different scope with dots holding an inch pattern but my shoulder shakes some
customer_reviews.author: James s.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This gun has tons of power , it does take a bit to cock it , but you will be impressed with the power it has. I was expecting a really cheesy scope , but I’m so far ver9y happy with it. For the money it’s a very nice gun. Don’t pass this one up. Not to mention it arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: james runkle

customer_reviews.title: ... but I shot it at some targets it was fun I can't wait for the hunt
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gone hunting yet but I shot it at some targets it was fun I can't wait for the hunt, the only gripe I have is the shipping, it barely made it to my house in a closed box
customer_reviews.author: d. m. hooper

customer_reviews.title: Opossum Slayer 🤘🏼☠️
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal , bought it to take care of the opossums... puts them down in one shot no problem . The scope is decent for an air rifle but optic snobs will not be impressed. I'm not one and it dose the job for me
customer_reviews.author: ADROC

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I just spent 2 hours shooting this power house air rifle, small game kill shots easy at 50 yards. When you cock the break barrel you will know how it gets its power not for the weak. Oh yes it kicks like a .22, the weight feels like a real rifle. Over all nothing con for me, you will need to figure out what pellets work best for you...😜
customer_reviews.author: Jay W.

customer_reviews.title: ups sucks
customer_reviews.text: it got here fast but the ups guy at some point he dropped it on its front sight smashing the box thankfully it works they need to be careful with peoples stuff.By the way mine works great and its very powerful and on target lol im glad
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Still need to dial in scope
customer_reviews.text: Powerfull 22 cal pellet gun, really hard break action. You need to be strong. Good price. Still need to dial in scope. I just plink, so i dont know how it hunts. With the hard sites i usually hit what i aim at from 25 yards in a quarter size grouping, so it is accurate. I have shot it with about 6 types/brands of pellets and they are all pretty consistent at 25 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Pedalhead

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful and very accurate with the scope that came with the rifle. RWH super H is the best pellet after testing it with 6 different pellets. 50' away 5 shots. Gamo Rocket is also pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chon

customer_reviews.title: They send me the wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Amazon send me the lower model first I had to return it and second time they send me the right product. Air rifle itself is high quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed right out of the box on the look and feel of this air rifle. Set up a target and dialed in the scope and now with repeated shots I find it very accurate in grouping on the shots.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Rakoz

customer_reviews.title: Price is right on target
customer_reviews.text: My husband's favorite Christmas gift. Great accuracy and range. Good collection
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Super hard hitter and included good scope that came with the gun. It is hard to cock though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the inner child
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 40 year old loves this thing. He is horribly picky when it comes to guns, and was impressed with the power of this rifle. It is spot on and if you're lucky will have a squirrel for dinner like we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Good gun not so good scope
customer_reviews.text: Works good the scope was a little hard to site in but I swapped it out for a spare that I had and it worked perfect after that.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Michael Presnell

customer_reviews.title: Great gun with a kick
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this air rifle. They sat for 3 days firing it. It is a little loud and has a slight kick. Still great buy and would buy again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: HeldForRansom

customer_reviews.title: 5G did better the the 7
customer_reviews.text: Very very very stong! But so powerful it's accracy is not what you would hope... 8.5G did better the the 7.4G had a hard time keeping it good.. Props to shipper tho. "Air Depot" I think was the one. Very very fast shipping awsome Service. Keeping it clean is important.
customer_reviews.author: Brian.. MN tested

customer_reviews.title: For REAL hunting. WAY to powerful for games and squirrels!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a squirrel gun and messed up in buying this. But, It is an amazing boar and coyote hunting gun that will crack as loud as a pistol if you do not use extra heavy pellets.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Dowbiggin

customer_reviews.title: Good but loud.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around, but my one major issue is that it is much much louder than expected. It resembles the sound of a .22 rimfire and I'm gonna have to return it as it is too loud to use in my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Perez

customer_reviews.title: Scary Acurate and hard hitting
customer_reviews.text: This gun shoots flat and fast, I pound nails 30yds all day with it. It is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt A.

customer_reviews.title: Great adult rifle
customer_reviews.text: Takes care of them varmints what I got it for and good for Target
customer_reviews.author: Miller man

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful .177 pellet gun, a little loud but really has a kick. Very nice ! Predators beware !
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: More power than expected. Takes some strength to charge. Not as quiet as expected
customer_reviews.author: michael m

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rifle, I been using it for squirrel hunting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rifle, I been using it for squirrel hunting, and target pratice. This rifle is for grownups only, the bake away is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the most accurate air rifle. 40 yards ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most accurate air rifle. 40 yards it holds 1" pattern. I can't shot my metal target because it mangled it. Wow is all I can say!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised...
customer_reviews.text: I have other GAMO Rifles but this one has a lot of power
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Oh
customer_reviews.text: POWERFUL! Beyond my expectation. It is accurate and precise between 50 and 75 yards but still put clean holes through 1/4 in ply at 100 with the regular everyday Crossman Premier pellets. Love it. Oh, it is a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality air rifle shoots well has a very nice scope on it
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Gun is beautiful and scope is top notch! That being said it is all irrelevant because this gun doesn’t keep a grouping at all! I’ve shot probably at least 500 pellets of different grains and types all to no avail. The incredible 1650fps is worthless if it can’t even hit a grouping! Will never buy another gamo again.
customer_reviews.author: kacee

customer_reviews.title: Too quality
customer_reviews.text: Great air gun it was a great choice couldnt be happier hits like a rim fire weapon
customer_reviews.author: vcruser

customer_reviews.title: Accurate air rifle.
customer_reviews.text: Great air rifle, very accurate precision for the small rodents such as gophers, moles, squirrels and even woodchuck. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Krill

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution.
customer_reviews.text: Just got one shot so far. Went clean through a steel 55gl drum.has plenty of power. Not a toy!
customer_reviews.author: john b.

customer_reviews.title: my gamo rifle magnum 1300fps 22 pellet
customer_reviews.text: When i bought this it did not take very long to get it the very first time i shot it i hit bullseye at 30 yards the distance of my yard i like it very much... this is an a adult air rifle not a toy
customer_reviews.author: I don’t want or even drive Jeep Wrangler they suck

customer_reviews.title: Hard to cock
customer_reviews.text: I love this gun. I wish I had this velocity as a kid. I’d use hollow points with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: met my expectation...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. This is my third air rifle and the best so far, no complain. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He who hesitates....
customer_reviews.text: This gun is a beast . It didnt take very long to zero in the scope. I will say it does take a little more effort to break the barrel. Not too bad if you're somewhat strong. I bought it to take care of rats and raccoons. For some reason neither has shown since I got this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McConnel

customer_reviews.title: That gun is kick ass. You should have one ...
customer_reviews.text: That gun is kick ass. You should have one. Unbelievable. Power. Put a little dab of Vaseline in the hollow of the pellet. Increases speed a lot. Wow. My grand daughter can shoot it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Byarski

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and accurate pellet rifle. Definitely like it, the only thing, which is not an issue for me but some moght not like, it's loud; it sounds like a .22lr
customer_reviews.author: Sevi

customer_reviews.title: What ya shootin at? Paper or creatures?
customer_reviews.text: For the price you could get a real rifle.. can't beat the ammo price and workout though
customer_reviews.author: CrunkyMonky

customer_reviews.title: Well made like a good quality powder gun
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, shoots great out of the box Looking to shoot more down range beyond 20yrds
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful airgun!
customer_reviews.text: This airgun is very well made and is easy to handle. It could be a challenge for some to cock but a great weapon for taking care of unwanted varmints.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my big cat 1200
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my big cat 1200, not sure if it's the better trigger or the gas spring. The only downside I could see someone having is it could be difficult for some people to compress the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Strong rifle, downside is kick.... once you get used to it u can adjust for it though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cock
customer_reviews.text: Everyone complains that this rifle is hard to cock. It is if you use your muscles. Use your body weight! Put the stock on the ground; extend your arms; then simply lower your body flexing your knees as you go down. Simple and easy
customer_reviews.author: Terry P / not that hard to break barrel

customer_reviews.title: Bitchin rifle( not for kids, not a toy)
customer_reviews.text: This rifle has exceeded my expectations, (this is no plinker, this is the rifle you choose when 22 cal firearm is not an option, lemme tell you it won’t disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Bradley c.

customer_reviews.title: Gamo Magnum best of best break barrel rifle.
customer_reviews.text: Quality made. Quality scope. The best break barrel made by Gamo. Took two shots to zeroed. I strongly recommend this rifle. If you want power this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful gun!! It is a tad bit loud for city shooting, but it does pack a wallop!!

customer_reviews.text: Tiz ok cocking little labor,but all all worth it so far. Not as accurate as I would like.

customer_reviews.text: This is the most accurate pellet rifle I’ve picked up The scope is also fantastic I truly love this gun I couldn’t ask for a better pellet rifle

customer_reviews.title: over 100 yards easy kill rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Exelente air rifle is no dout , over 100 yards easy kill rabbit, raccoons, ect ect....

customer_reviews.text: Like: absolute power. 💪 very accurate (at least with the sniper magnum pellets) Dislikes: loud as f#@k. Sounds like a .22 long rifle.

product_meta.title: Magnum Air Rifle
product_meta.description: Gamo 611006154 Magnum .177. Air guns 500Fps or more. This product is manufactured in Spain.Air guns 500Fps or more.
feature_bullets: Made of the highest qualitiy materials
Air guns rifles. Trigger pull: 3.2 pounds

CAT (Custom Action Trigger) - Independently adjust 1st and 2nd stages, adjust your trigger to your personal preference, make it predictable. Comfortable all-weather synthetic ambidextrous thumbhole stock
